channel.title: automation on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in automation on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: DevOps Automation AI
item.description: DevOps Automation AI Mission Automate DevOps for the most optimal development cycle Problem DevOps systems are often reproducible from blocks of yml Isn’t easily to enforce rules across the organization Best practices are often repeated among different repositories Solution One-stop automated AI solution for your organization’s DevOps needs SaaS to enforce rules easily throughout the organization through visual and command line interfaces Implement the best practices of the industry easily in one click
item.content:encoded: DevOps Automation AI Mission Automate DevOps for the most optimal development cycle Problem DevOps systems are often reproducible from blocks of yml Isn&rsquo;t easily to enforce rules across the organization Best practices are often repeated among different repositories Solution One-stop automated AI solution for your organization&rsquo;s DevOps needs SaaS to enforce rules easily throughout the organization through visual and command line interfaces Implement the best practices of the industry easily in one click

item.title: Free task automation workloads online
item.description: Free task automation workloads offline Mission Propel towards a safer internet through task automation completed in one place Problem Installing custom software for common tasks is potentially very dangerous No platform for providing automated workloads Devops-like solution doesn’t exist for most people Solution Democratize DevOps solution Automate common tasks for free to conclude in one place Open the power of OSS for all individuals
item.content:encoded: Free task automation workloads offline Mission Propel towards a safer internet through task automation completed in one place Problem Installing custom software for common tasks is potentially very dangerous No platform for providing automated workloads Devops-like solution doesn&rsquo;t exist for most people Solution Democratize DevOps solution Automate common tasks for free to conclude in one place Open the power of OSS for all individuals
